entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Beauceville

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle. High 11.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or freezing drizzle changing to periods of drizzle this morning and ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 11. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:08 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
